vviq.Description: The participant's average vividness of visual imagery questionnaire score

bais.Description: The participant's average vividness of auditory imagery questionnaire score

cap.Description: size of the cap used for the participant

vision_impaired.Description: Refers to whether participant has normal or corrected vision or has vision impairment

hearing_impaired.Description: Refers to whether participant has normal or corrected hearing or has hearing impairment
